bibl.title: Notice of Annual Meeting of Members of the Walter Reed Memorial Association, by J.F. Siler, November 30, 1950

div1.p: Siler informs members of the Association about the date of the annual meeting.

div1.head: Notice of Annual Meeting of Members of the Walter Reed Memorial Association, by J.F. Siler, November 30, 1950
div1.p:
NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF MEMBERS
OF
THE WALTER REED MEMORIAL ASSOCIATION

The ANNUAL MEETING of MEMBERS of THE WALTER REED MEMORIAL ASSOCIATION
will be held in the Board Room, American Security and Trust Company, 15th
Street and Pennsylvania Avenue, Northwest, Washington, D. C., at ten o'clock
in the forenoon on Thursday, December 14, 1950 for the purpose of hearing
reports of officers, electing directors to fill all vacancies, electing
officers for the ensuing year and for the transaction of any other business
that may properly come before the meeting.

As a number of important matters will require consideration, it is
hoped that it will be possible for you to attend.
div1.closer:
J. F. Siler, Secretary The Surgeon General, Dept. of the Army
Dr. Philip S. Hench
Mr. Hans W. Ireland
Dr. Gilbert Grosvenor
Brig. Gen. F. R. Keefer
Brig. Gen. A. G. Love
Maj. Gen. C. R. Reynolds
Col. J. F. Siler
Dr. Fred L. Soper
Trust Department, American Security & Trust Co
